Description:
Join Karan M V, GitHub's International Developer Relations Director, as he unpacks the staggering findings from the 2025 Octoverse report. India added over 5 million developers this year alone, and by 2030, 1 in 3 new developers globally will be from India. Karan discusses the drivers behind this surge, from AI adoption to the power of diversity.

#Octoverse #India #SoftwareDevelopment

Read the full Octoverse 2025 report: https://gh.io/octoverse

— CHAPTERS —

00:00 - India's rise as a global developer hub 00:18 - Why 5 million new developers joined in 2025 01:00 - How diversity drives innovation in India 01:43 - AI adoption and coding in native languages 02:24 - Indian developers on the global stage 03:07 - Contributing back to open source and AI

Author: GitHub
Title: Why India is the world's fastest-growing developer hub | Octoverse 2025
